cv-description: Thank you for considering my profile! If you're looking for more information about my skills, feel free to check my CV below:
powerso: Dynamic web platform revolutionizing electric vehicle (EV) charging accessibility. Display real-time charging locations, calculating routes for the trip considering charging stations near the route depending on the radius.
punkta: Insurance comparison site. Main functionalities are insurance comparisor and insurance calculator. Multisite with dedicated administration panel.
rumszewicz: Portal for sailing camps bookings. Integrated to WooCommerce combined with custom solutions provides complex managment inside admin panel.
subu: Multilingual shop integrated with WooCommerce. Elevating practicality to new levels, SUBU redefines the very essence of outdoor shoes, revealing a surprising blend of softness and functionality.
worwo: Shop with custom administration panel integrated with WooCommerce where you can find and buy every vacuum cleaner bag.
punkta_travel: Created for adventurers, great tool for finding dream holidays. Here you can plan your adventure including checking for transport, accomodation. Connected with adventurer blog where you can check for all trip info.
jsite: Multilingual website realised for University of Warmia and Mazury containing database of scientific works.
collibre: Shop integrated with WooCommerce containing blog which provides every information about selling product.
awspektrum: Simple landing page for valuer giving him opportuinity to gather new clients.
